snippet: Ahmed Shafiq, a former presidential candidate, was referred to trial on corruption charges on Tuesday, security and judicial officials said.
abstract: Ahmed Shafik, a former Egyptian presidential candidate and Hosni Mubarak’s last prime minister, is referred to trial on corruption charges; Shafik is accused of selling land at a fraction of its value to Mubarak’s sons, Gamal and Alaa, when Shafik was chairman of a housing association in the 1990s.
lead_paragraph: Ahmed Shafiq, a former presidential candidate, was referred to trial on corruption charges on Tuesday, security and judicial officials said.

headline.main: Egypt: Former Presidential Contender to Face Charges
headline.print_headline: Egypt: Former Presidential Contender to Face Charges
